Platform Customization

There are multiple ways to customize Thingsboard platform to suite your needs:

  • Rule Engine - allows to add data processing logic and invoke built-in plugins. If you can’t find suitable rule or plugin you can always implement them
    • Add new Rule Filter based on following examples
    • Add new Rule Processor based on following examples
    • Add new Rule Action based on following examples
    • Add new Plugin based on following core examples or extensions that push data to external systems.
  • Widgets Library - allows to add new widget bundles.
  • Device Connectivity Protocols - add new protocol or customize existing implementations
